channel.title: Cairngorms on Images and Opinions
channel.description: Recent content in Cairngorms on Images and Opinions

item.title: Lochnagar
item.description: Mount Keen is the nearest Munro to where we live but it’s a bit of a lump. Lochnagar is the nearest ‘interesting’ hill, which is about 90 minutes drive from our house. Lochnagar is one of my favourite hills. I first climbed there in the 1970s in the days when I was into winter climbing and I’ve been to the top countless times since then. Winter climbing on Black Spout Buttress This year, I was chatting to our (relatively) new neighbours and discovered that, although natives of Aberdeen, they had never been to the top of Lochnagar.
